input.sentences: we took a small trip to the rural lands today .
we saw one that was shaped like a castle .
we even saw this fancy looking one .
overall | we had a great time and saw many amazing buildings .
output.sentences: i am going on a trip to visit unique buildings.
This building has an unusual arhchitecture to it with a tower as part of the building.
This looks like it might have beena castle or a fortress in the past.
This looks more like traditional architecture and could easily be a state or government office.
It looks like it may be a factory with a tall chimney..
